column5: Hey all, Couldn't make it to bluffer's today as I was stuck downtown because I had to pick someone up in the evening. So I ended up fishing the harbourfront. Had only a couple of follows and bites after the first couple of hours but around 7:30 when the sun was just setting I caught my first 2 pike ever within 10 minutes of each other! They weren't hogs by any stretch of the imagination but I was excited as hell.  Thanks to the random passerby who took a pic of me with one of the pike.  I have to hang around the photography forum more so I can figure out how to get the proper angles to show the size of the fish.
nice fish there congrats on ur first many more to come hopefully
Hey!!! Great job!  You have to start somewhere...congrats on the first pikes.  You'll get into more...just wait until fall!!
congrats on first pike, i also caught my very first pike at the harbourfront last year  what did the pike have an appetite for ?
Congratulations on your first.  Now tell us about the who, what, when, why and how...enquiring minds want to know!!! Garry2r's
WTG man... may they be the first of many more for ya
Awesome!  First fish is always a blast... now you gotta catch a first monster pike  Well, I'm off to the Bluffs, wondering if anythin' is there...
There you go! Beware! theres monsters around there.
Congrats on your first Pike!!   Your pictures are fine, thanks for sharing
WTG shes a beaut!!! Your Lucky my first was an 18 pounder Scared the hell out of me
Nice pike errr snot rocket. Some of my baits are bigger than that!!
